description:
The Akudarma trio go to Boston on March 10th, 1876 in order to find Alexander Graham Bell, who invented the telephone. They find Bell and the Dynamond at his laboratory. They call his name, which startles him and he spills acid on his pants. Bell apparently wants to make a hotline for children who have no one else to talk to and that`s when Tokio and Calen show up. Who will be able to give these kids the best answers and win the Dynamond?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alexander Graham Bell Invented the Telephone! What Super Surprising Struggle Led to Its Creation?!
Denwa o Hatsumei Shita Graham Bell! Denwa no Tanjou o Meguru Bikkuri Dokkuri na Arasoi to wa!?
電話を発明したグラハム・ベル! 電話の誕生をめぐるビックリドッキリな争いとは!?
